long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready to relive the adrenaline-filled action of Contra - Arcade Game! This legendary run-and-gun game is back, bringing its iconic gameplay and thrilling shootouts to your browser. Join the fight as a fearless soldier, armed with powerful weapons, battling through waves of alien forces and dodging traps. Contra Unblocked is perfect for fans of old-school arcade shooters who want a challenge!

Why Install Contra - Arcade Game?
Instant Play: No downloads, just instant browser access to the classic Contra experience!
Authentic Arcade Gameplay: Enjoy the original levels, weapons, and enemies that made Contra a timeless favorite.
Co-Op Mode: Play solo or invite a friend to join in on the action—double the firepower, double the fun!
Epic Boss Battles: Face off against monstrous bosses in heart-pounding battles that require skill and strategy.
Nostalgic Graphics & Sound: Immerse yourself in retro visuals and sounds that capture the true spirit of arcade gaming.

Extra Features 🚀
Play More Games Menu: Explore more classic and unblocked games through the top-left menu.
Share & Rate: Use the icons at the bottom-right to rate the game and share it with friends, challenging them to beat your score!
Are you ready to fight the alien invasion? Install Contra Unblocked and become a hero today! 🔫
